short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reload the DFA contact page until the form is ready

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DFA contact website is often overrun during the summer months and to chat with someone you need to refresh the page constantly until a button appears you can click. This extension will reload the page until the button appears.

Instructions:

 - Once you install the extension, pin the DFA extension to the extension toolbar.
 - Visit the DFA chat URL (https://www.dfa.ie/passports/contact/).
 - If you see the graphic with "All our webchat agents are currently busy ..." then click the DFA extension to open the popup, and initiate the reloading process by clicking the "Run" button.
 - When the graphic changes to "Start webchat here", the extension will stop and you can continue to your chat.

You'll receive a browser notification when the chat is ready to begin.

*This is not an official product of the DFA
